website_summaries.verdict: The Wii U is good for Nintendo lovers and great for families, but hold out for the Switch, the Wii U's imminent successor.
pros: An included tablet-style GamePad can play games when the TV is in use
Nintendo has a core library of awesome exclusive titles
works with older Wii games and accessories
Access to a vault of your childhood classics.
cons: lacks a lot of third-party games available on Xbox or PlayStation
GamePad wireless range and battery life are too short
Wii U and 3DS handheld don't share games

customer_reviews.title: They got me
customer_reviews.text: I bought tgis for my daughter for christmas and at first everything seemed perfect until i tried to stick a game in there. I tried several and all the disc would not read. So i kept trying and suddenly disc began to read but ...it would freeze completely after. Didnt want to return it even though i called amazon to do just that because my daughter was so happy to see it. So i called nintendo and now im going through the process of getting it repaired by them smdh. So christmas was ruined for her and sad for me. 150.00 for a dead system. Buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: lashonda brown grier

customer_reviews.title: The game pad has awkward controls and feel like you're playing on a tablet
customer_reviews.text: The console is an interesting installment in the Nintendo console series. Of course it wouldn't be Nintendo if it weren't a little bit unorthodox. The game pad has awkward controls and feel like you're playing on a tablet. The wii u menu is very confusing, the graphics are nothing to show off if it weren't for the fantastic Nintendo exclusive titles I'd give this 1 star
customer_reviews.author: Bill Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love my Wii U
customer_reviews.text: Lets face facts, PS4 and Xone are just computers, so why buy them if you have a boss PC. The Wii U caters to gamers who enjoyed playing video games back when graphics wasn't everything and multiplayer meant inviting your friends or cousins over to play. Plus I can actually play this thing when my friends and I are drinking, giving a nice added touch to the classics haha. Let those other fanboys fight it over, as a REAL gamer I love my classics and my Wii U
customer_reviews.author: Johnson

customer_reviews.title: So Much Potential.
customer_reviews.text: If you like Nintendo you will love the Wii U. The Wii U touch pad is honestly the most useful item from this purchase. The set up for the Wii U includes programming the touch pad to be your television remote. This was excellent for us cause we don't use cable or satellite television, so this provided us with a universal remote. The Touch pad works when the console is turned off, great for energy conservation. Best of all the console has amazing potential and I am looking forward to seeing how Nintendo unlocks its potential.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Ivory

customer_reviews.title: Everything you love about Nintendo Wii U
customer_reviews.text: Everything you love about Nintendo Wii U, in gleaming pearly-white! It is an elegant machine that works well, plays fantastic games and is handsome on the display shelf in its pristine white sheen. All is win with Wii U!
customer_reviews.author: Lupucillo

customer_reviews.title: I like most about is the great games played on the ...
customer_reviews.text: I like most about is the great games played on the gaming system and the least would be which ones is control by internet and how much the games are from the gaming system.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but now I'm so glad that I did
customer_reviews.text: At first I was wary about buying this console, but now I'm so glad that I did. Super Smash Bros 4, Mario Kart 8, Splatoon, these are all great games that I've enjoyed on this system! However, If I could do it over I might get the wii-u with more GB. 8GB is good for me because I'm not an extreme gamer, but if you are you might need the extra space. So I would recommend more GB if you plan on some gaming a whole lot.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Williams

customer_reviews.title: disapointing
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to playing this so much and it didn't come with its proper power cord. Edit: I finally received a power cord but the console doesnt work. DO NOT TRUST THIS SELLER

customer_reviews.title: Great seller

customer_reviews.text: Excelent Gaming Console! It was used as described, and came in excelent condition!

Not worried about it having signs of wear and tear, but would have liked to have known it would not be coming with all the parts and pieces.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome system
customer_reviews.text: Definitely an upgrade over the Wii. However, it would be best to wait until Nintendo releases better games, such as Mario Kart and Smash Bros. Also, I would wait to see what Sony and Microsoft come out with. At this price point, Nintendo should have used better a better CPU and better resolution on the gamepad. I'm scared to see what frame rate games will run at once Nintendo releases games that support 2 gamepads.

customer_reviews.title: Great System That Revolves Around Fun
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this for 24 hours with New Super Mario Bros. U and I have to say that I can already tell this system is going to provide plenty of time filled back up with fun games as oppose to very realistic ones. I like that Nintendo sticks to the creative side of everything...this is what drove me to purchase the Wii U. I have nothing bad to say about the tablet controller and everything seems to work great. Awesome for all ages. Looking forward to what happens with this system into the future!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff J.

customer_reviews.title: It's a great system that has gotten a bad-wrap
customer_reviews.text: It's a great system that has gotten a bad-wrap. Love the games and IP, and those who complain about recycled games or that they are for kids - I don't think that is the target audience in mind. I do wonder, though, if anyone still buys the white version. I kind of like mine because most of my friends have the black one (if they have one at all). Makes me feel unique.
customer_reviews.author: Tetrarch

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME SYSTEM
customer_reviews.text: Well as a huge gaming nerd, i give it 4 stars! why would i do that? The game selection is only so-so. BUT Mario Kart 8, Super Smash Bros 4, Hyrule Warriors, and tons of other Great games are coming out soon. And if you think Nintendo has no M rated games, this system has Assassins Creed 3(pretty sure that's the name) and Assassins Creed Black Flag, and Mass Effect 3. The library is growing and i would recommend you buy it.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Few Errors
customer_reviews.text: Everything was nice and unworn, except the Gamepad, which has a sizable gash on the screen,which doesn't interfere with the display noticeably, but it is very noticeable when the display is off. The Gamepad did not have the original stylus, but was replaced with a green 3DSXL Stylus, whereas this makes no difference.

Still, can't get over the broken console though.

product_meta.title: Nintendo Wii U Console 8GB Basic Set - White
product_meta.description:
Nintendo Wii U Console 8GB Basic Set - White
Nintendo Wii U Basic Set WUPSWAAB Video Game Consoles



Four USB 2.0 connector slots are included. The new console is backward compatible with Wii games and Wii accessories.IBM Power-based multi-core microprocessor.Up to four Wii Remote (or Wii Remote Plus) controllers can be connected at once. The new console supports all Wii controllers and input devices, including the Nunchuk™ controller, Classic Controller, Classic Controller Pro and Wii Balance Board.Approximately 1.8 inches tall, 6.8 inches wide and 10.5 inches long.Uses AV Multi Out connector. Six-channel PCM linear output through HDMI.
feature_bullets: Four USB 2.0 connector slots are included. The new console is backward compatible with Wii games and Wii accessories.

Up to four Wii Remote (or Wii Remote Plus) controllers can be connected at once. The new console supports all Wii controllers and input devices, including the Nunchuk™ controller, Classic Controller, Classic Controller Pro and Wii Balance Board.
Approximately 1.8 inches tall, 6.8 inches wide and 10.5 inches long.
Uses AV Multi Out connector. Six-channel PCM linear output through HDMI.
